name: Hrybnik - a c o z y a d v e n t u r e
name_original: Hrybnik - a c o z y a d v e n t u r e
description: Demo for a personal project about a witch who travels back to her grandmother's village to take up the mantle of Village Witch. Working on building in a foraging system, crafting system for potions, and creating gentle interactions with the townspeople who come to your cabin for help.
